alert.note: Alert for Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 27 at 12:31AM PST until February 28 at 12:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected this afternoon and evening. Total snow accumulations up to a foot. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible midday Tuesday to midday Wednesday. Total snow accumulations up to 14 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from noon today to midnight PST tonight. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
